description: I'm a Linux newbie on Ubuntu 18.04. After installing wekan-ondra it didn't add an icon into the Applications and i have to search for it in Software. When trying to launch it it just shows the terminal windows for a split second, so I even can't see what's going on in it.

set url address: sudo snap set wekan-ondra root-url='http://localhost:5000'
set port: sudo snap set wekan-ondra port='5000'
restart app: sudo systemctl restart snap.wekan.wekan-ondra
summary: it's useful, but need some configuration

description: Tried the workaround config shared by Alireza Abedini. Had problems with the final restart command. Not sure if it's a problem with the command or my system. (I'm still fairly new at using Linux). Love the idea of this app because I've used it on my windows pc way back but can't get it to run.
no funciona chicos, ni gasten su tiempo
summary: no funciona chicos, ni gasten su tiempo

description: tout est dans le titre. Je n'ai jamais pu faire fonctionner cette application installer avec Discover.
Очень силь жрет процессор. Причем не сразу понятно что это оно. Его не видно, кроме как в Htop. и причем не убивается.
summary: over 99999 eat CPU!! Sorry about my Eng!
